nodes.text: The Braltzamir Museum of Antiquated Machinery was a museum located on Coruscant. It contained antiquated machinery from throughout the galaxy as study pieces.

One of its famous, or rather, infamous exhibitions was the body of the Abominor known as the Great Heep, which had been deactivated at least 300 years prior to the formation of the Galactic Empire in 19 BBY. Eventually, the Great Heep had been resurrected and removed from the museum by a team of brilliant students from the Imperial Engineers Academy under the order of Imperial Navy Admiral Terrinald Screed.
